attributes.action: prohibit small trailers pulled by private cars from driving on motorways
attributes.additional_details:
In my experience  small "domestic"  trailers  being pulled by private  cars  tend to be insecurely loaded and the loads not safely tied down.

If they shed their loads on a motorway  they can cause very serious accidents.
I have seen this happen.

Therefore please consider  a new law to prohibit  small trailers  being towed by private cars from driving on Motorways.
